name: CreateDnsRecord
description:
Creates a DNS record for a domain.

Use this tool to create a DNS record for a specified domain. It helps manage DNS configurations by adding new records as needed.

parameters.name: domain_name_for_dns_record
parameters.description: The domain for which the DNS record will be created. Must be a valid and registered domain name.

value_schema.description: The domain used to create the DNS record.

parameters.name: dns_record_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the DNS record to create, including type, name, value, etc.

type.description: The type of record, it could be one of the valid DNS records.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier for performing the request.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug identifier for the team performing the DNS record creation. It should be a string that represents the team's unique slug.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The domain used to create the DNS record.

value_schema.description: The domain used to create the DNS record.

type.description: The type of record, it could be one of the valid DNS records.
